subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Tesla clip
author: Misty Dawn
full_text:
--0-701321841-1193980818=:7662
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=iso-8859-1
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 8bit

Yeah I went over some of that stuff too. Even ran a test session at some point for someone. For me my problem is I dont have the personal connection I need to define whether it is edison, houdini or lennon or whoever on the other end. There are many false pretenses on my part in assuming it is indeed really them. 
   
  Even with personal connection it has taken a very long time to accept certain energies I dont know as being genuine. Certain proofs have been made and substantiated over the years I have been at this, enough that I just dont question some things anymore yet other things I question even moreso. But for evp like that, it will take alot more than them telling me "this is edison" for me to go hey that ones him. He can talk about all the scientific or personal stuff he wants but it will mean little to me because I simply dont have that connection. Until I do hes just another "edison dude" or "lennon dude" or whatever LOL I have had quite a few "names" come thru.
   
  All we can do is share and let people get thier own impression of what was said. Sometimes someone has that personal connection needed to verify what came thru. Kinda why I try and post names when they make an effort to come thru and give thier name. I may not know them, half the time cant think how to spell it so just go phonetics as usual.. but now and again it reaches who it is supposed to and they fill me in on why that evp was true or that the person named was someone they knew/know.
   
  It's all interesting, but I dont always take it as always being the truth, just to view it as a learning tool and grow from the experience.
   
  It's been quite a ride!
   
  Misty

Lisby <lisby@...> wrote:
          I have heard it and was not impressed, neither as a Spiritualist or a historian. And I want Houdini to talk from beyond--I really, deeply do. But this wasn't it. HMO and your milage may vary and all, and obviously does. But please believe me that I approached that material months ago with the greatest hope that it would be genuine. I saw nothing in it that convinced me.  

  Ann
  
    On Nov 1, 2007, at 4:11 PM, Frank Ratka wrote:

          

    Yes, David Thompson (Materialization Medium) with the The Circle of the Silver Cord. He has Victor Zammit's confidence as well as mine.

http://www.itcbridge.com/forum/view_topic.php?id=199&forum_id=11

Regards,

Frank R.

  ----- Original Message ----
From: Lisby <lisby@...>
To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Thursday, November 1, 2007 3:03:58 PM
Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Tesla clip

    Harry has discussed this with someone?
  

  Ann
  
    On Nov 1, 2007, at 3:46 PM, Frank Ratka wrote:

          

    I highly doubt there is a afterlife rivalry between the two of them. Where would the rivalry or competition come from? As for Chris, well he has a gift for being dramatic to a fault. I have in the past heard Edison wants to be left alone and doesn't want to mess with scientific subjects anymore. He is content in his present work (whatever that may be).

Houdini and his enemies have sense "buried the hatchet" and they were willing to kill each other over their lifetime rivalry. Harry has since said they are cordial.

Regards,

Frank R.

  ----- Original Message ----
From: Lisby <lisby@...>
To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Thursday, November 1, 2007 2:06:16 PM
Subject: [EVP-ITC] Tesla clip

    Oh dear. I keep hope that this supposed rivalry between dead Edison and dead Tesla is just a cosmic joke being pulled on Chris Moon...
  

  Ann
  

  
    On Nov 1, 2007, at 8:07 AM, EVP-ITC@yahoogroups .com wrote:
